name: The Negotiation
paragraphs: "Please," you plead, "let me go. I won't tell anyone about this." The figure seems to consider your words for a moment before finally speaking in a low, guttural voice. "You know too much," it growls, and you feel a cold shiver run down your spine.

Suddenly, the door to the room bursts open, and a SWAT team storms in. The figure turns to face them, giving you just enough time to break free of the restraints and run towards the door. You hear gunfire and screams behind you as you make your escape, but you don't stop until you're out of the building.

As you look back at the building from a safe distance, you see it explode in a massive fireball. You realize with horror that the experiments being conducted there were far more dangerous than you could have ever imagined. You vow to never speak of what happened again, but you know that the memory will haunt you for the rest of your life.
